notes: This image is aligned 1:1 with hillshade_paper_rotcrop.webp pixel space.
Alpha channel is AOI alpha; outside AOI alpha is 0.
WARNING: This script requires bounds_rotcrop.json to contain pre_squish_W/pre_squish_H if squished=true.
If missing, either add those fields in bake.py OR re-run bake.py with squish disabled.
